name: Cute Tiny: Party Dress Up
description:
Use your imagination to create your own exciting fashion in this fun fairy dress up game. There are accessories, new clothes,
and more that you can combine to create your own unique style. With tons of dress up options for you to choose from,
you can spend as much time as you'd like making your character as awesome as possible. When you're done dressing your character,
show off your designs to all of your friends!
